TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewImageCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 顯示 控制項中的圖形。

span.span: Displays a graphic in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的用來顯示或上的值，取決於屬性。The class is a specialized type of used to display an or an , depending on the value of the property. 一般而言，屬性設`true`指出使用者無法編輯儲存格的內容。Typically, the property of a is set to `true` to indicate that the user cannot edit the cell contents. 資料行類型特製化來保存此類型的儲存格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 根據預設，會初始化為新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要模式之後的現有資料行內的資料格，設定的資料行模式使用儲存格的屬性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 資料行的儲存格相關屬性是類似的範本資料格屬性的包裝函式。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 變更範本儲存格的屬性值會影響只有儲存格根據範本在變更之後所新增。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 變更資料行的儲存格相關的屬性值，不過，將更新的範本資料格和資料行中，所有其他資料格，並重新整理資料行顯示，如有必要。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更映像的儲存格使用映像。The following code example demonstrates how to change the image in an image cell using . 這個程式碼範例是相關的主題所提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the topic [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#10)]

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用這個建構函式，屬性設定的值為`valueIsIcon`參數。When you use this constructor, the property is set to the value of the `valueIsIcon` parameter. 若要確保的 alpha 色板正確繪製的值，請使用這個建構函式`valueIsIcon`參數值的`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valueIsIcon` parameter value of `true`. 如果`valueIsIcon`參數是`true`、和屬性傳回物件，代表型別。If the `valueIsIcon` parameter is `true`, the and properties return a object representing the type.

para.span: 在覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容會複製到新的儲存格，並確定也將複製的值加入至衍生類別的任何屬性。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 取得建立新資料列時所用的預設值。

span.span: Gets the default value that is used when creating a new row.

value.span: 包含預設影像預留位置的物件， 表示顯示空的儲存格。

span.span: An object containing a default image placeholder, or to display an empty cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值應該是類型或型別上的值，取決於屬性。The value of this property should be of type or type , depending on the value of the property. 每當會顯示可以加入新資料列，最後一個資料列是空的新資料列載入具有預設值的資料格。Whenever a is displayed in which new rows can be added, the last row is an empty new row of cells loaded with default values. 覆寫這個屬性，這些資料格提供不同的預設映像，或傳回`null`以避免顯示影像。Override this property to provide a different default image for these cells or to return `null` to avoid displaying images.

summary.span: 取得或設定與影像相關的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with the image.

value.span: 與顯示在儲存格中的影像相關的文字。

span.span: The text associated with the image displayed in the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會提供每個映像資料格的文字描述。You will typically provide a text description for each image cell. 此描述會提供可存取的替代至映像。This description provides an accessible alternative to the image. 此外，儲存格的值會複製到剪貼簿時，會使用描述文字。Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定資料行中每個資料格的屬性。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值是一個屬性是物件，代表其中類型或類型，因為只能處理圖形影像。The value of this property is a property is a object representing either the type or the type because a can only handle graphic images. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料格內容的型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此範例中，屬性用來判斷是否要包含儲存格然後再嘗試將值轉換。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會呼叫此方法，將資料格的值轉換為對等的顯示值所表示的型別屬性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控制項將資料格的值傳遞至這個方法在`value`參數。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 如果`context`參數值包含值，這個方法會傳回的值屬性複製到剪貼簿。If the `context` parameter value includes the value, this method returns the value of the property for copying to the Clipboard. 否則，就會發生事件。Otherwise, the event occurs. A事件處理常式可以修改同時`value`和`cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 如果未設定此處理常式屬性`true`，不過，這個方法會格式化`value`使用的格式屬性`cellStyle`物件。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 如果格式設定不成功，就會發生事件。If formatting is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果沒有處理常式集合或這個事件沒有處理常式屬性`true`，擲回例外狀況。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果格式設定成功，而且之格式化值的型別符合值的屬性，這個方法會傳回格式化的值。If formatting is successful and the type of the formatted value matches the value of the property, this method returns the formatted value. 否則，這個方法會傳回標準錯誤圖形中所指定的類型屬性。Otherwise, this method returns a standard error graphic in the type indicated by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更這個屬性會導致重繪其本身的儲存格。Changing this property will cause the cell to redraw itself. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個儲存格是否顯示 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this cell displays an value.

value.span: 如果這個儲存格顯示 值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this cell displays an value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要確保的 alpha 色板正確繪製的值，這個屬性設定為`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`. 當這個屬性是`true`、和屬性傳回物件，代表型別。When this property is `true`, the and properties return a object representing the type. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 當這個屬性的值變更為新記錄的資料列中的資料格時，在資料格中所顯示的影像會更新為目前的值屬性。When the value of this property changes for a cell in the row for new records, the image displayed in the cell is updated to the current value of the property. 與資料行不同屬性，資料格屬性不會自動更新時變更其值的相關聯的儲存格樣式屬性。Unlike the column property, the cell property does not automatically update the property of the associated cell style when you change its value. 當您變更資料格屬性值設定為`true`，請務必設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性設為有效。When you change the cell property value to `true`, be sure to set the property of the object returned by the property to a valid . 當您變更屬性值設定為`false`，請務必設定屬性設為有效。When you change the property value to `false`, be sure to set the property to a valid .

.property instance class System.Type ValueType

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格中值的資料類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
The of the cell's value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當擷取這個屬性，如果儲存格已設定，然後在會使用主控資料行，如果存在的話。When retrieving this property, if the for the cell has not been set, then the for the owning column is used, if it exists. 如果沒有主控資料行存在，預設值使用類型時，也就是輸入如果屬性設定為`false`和否則輸入。If no owning column exists, the default value type is used, which is the type if the property is set to `false` and the type otherwise. 是實際的資料物件包含的資料格，而屬性是此物件的格式化的表示法。The is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the property is the formatted representation of this object. 和屬性分別對應至這些值的資料型別。The and properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
